ValidationRule.description: Don't allow them to move a lightning PDN opp to stage 4, 5 or 6 if they haven't submitted it to the design team.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Approval_Status__c, "Not Submitted"), RecordTypeId = "01239000000QUb2", (OR(TEXT(StageName)= "4- Propose", TEXT(StageName)= "5- Implement", TEXT(StageName)= "6- Close/Won")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move beyond stage 3 on a PDN Opportunity until you have submitted the opportunity to the design team. Either Submit for Approval or change the record type back to Standard Opportunity.
